author: mloenko
msg: [classlib][security]javax.crypto.spec.CipherOutputStream.write(byte[], 0, 0) throws IllegalStateException while RI does not

author: nicko
msg: Fix for LOG4NET-79. Added catch handler for SecurityException in LogicalThreadContextProperties GetProperties method. This is caused by a LinkDemand for Infrastructure permission on the CallContext.GetProperties method.

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-1417: Add new, lengthless overloads to the streaming api
jdbc4/ResultSetTest.junit. A few utility methods have been introduced,
and a TestSetup-class (anonymous) was used to create the table
once. This was done because the previous implementation could cause
other tests to fail if one test failed.
The utility methods follow a pattern that will also be used by a
number of tests written for the new lengthless overloads.

author: dennisl
msg: Generate info and reports from the pom
